org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.netty

类 NettyBufferPool

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.netty.NettyBufferPool
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    org.apache.flink.shaded.netty4.io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator

    public class NettyBufferPool
extends java.lang.Object
implements org.apache.flink.shaded.netty4.io.netty.buffer.ByteBufAllocator
    Wrapper around Netty's PooledByteBufAllocator with strict control over the number of created arenas.

    • 字段概要

    • 构造器详细资料

      • NettyBufferPool

        public NettyBufferPool(int numberOfArenas)
        Creates Netty's buffer pool with the specified number of direct arenas.
        参数:
        numberOfArenas - Number of arenas (recommended: 2 * number of task slots)

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNumberOfArenas

        int getNumberOfArenas()
        Returns the number of arenas.
        返回:
        Number of arenas.

      • getChunkSize

        int getChunkSize()
        Returns the chunk size.
        返回:
        Chunk size.

      • getNumberOfAllocatedBytes

        public scala.Option<java.lang.Long> getNumberOfAllocatedBytes()
                                                       throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                                              java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Returns the number of currently allocated bytes.

        The stats are gathered via Reflection and are mostly relevant for debugging purposes.

        返回:
        Number of currently allocated bytes.
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - Error getting the statistics (should not happen when the Netty version stays the same).
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Error getting the statistics (should not happen when the Netty version stays the same).

      • getNumberOfAllocatedChunks

        private long getNumberOfAllocatedChunks(java.lang.Object arena,
                                        java.lang.String chunkListFieldName)
                                 throws java.lang.NoSuchFieldException,
                                        java.lang.IllegalAccessException
        Returns the number of allocated bytes of the given arena and chunk list.
        参数:
        arena - Arena to gather statistics about.
        chunkListFieldName - Chunk list to check.
        返回:
        Number of total allocated bytes by this arena.
        抛出:
        java.lang.NoSuchFieldException - Error getting the statistics (should not happen when the Netty version stays the same).
        java.lang.IllegalAccessException - Error getting the statistics (should not happen when the Netty version stays the same).
